sentences.sContent: My dorm always has the best parties.
sentences.sContent_eng: My dorm always has the best parties.
sentences.sCn: 我的宿舍总是有最好的派对。

sentences.sContent: So, some can stay in the dorm for an entire month without talking at all with anyone.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, some can stay in the dorm for an entire month without talking at all with anyone.
sentences.sCn: 因此，有些学生能待在宿舍里整整一个月不与任何人讲话。

sentences.sContent: I saw her around campus occasionally - she lived in the same dorm as a girl I dated that year, but nothing noteworthy ever really happened.
sentences.sContent_eng: I saw her around campus occasionally - she lived in the same dorm as a girl I dated that year, but nothing noteworthy ever really happened.
sentences.sCn: 我偶尔会在学校里看到她——她跟我那年交往的一个女孩住在同一个宿舍，但是从来没发生过什么值得注意的事。

remMethod.val: 本身为词根， 意为“睡眠”， dorm是dormitory的缩写
